scripts.clean: lerna run clean && rm -rf node_modules; for d in packages/*/node_modules; do echo $d; rm -rf $d; done
scripts.upgrade.packages: yarn upgrade --latest && rm -f yarn.lock && yarn | true && yarn lint.fix || true
scripts.upgrade.packages.workspaces: yarn && for d in packages/*; do cd $d; yarn-upgrade-all; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.test: yarn upgrade.packages.all && yarn lint && yarn build && yarn test
